title: Early Labor Day TV sale at Best Buy: smart TV deals starting at $179.99
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score early Best Buy Labor Day TV deals from TCL
article: The highly anticipated Labor Day sales event will be here before you know it (September 6, to be exact), and Best Buy is getting a head start with a slew of cheap TV deals that you can shop right now. Best Buy's Labor Day TV sales include a range of TCL smart TVs that start at just $179.99.

All of the early Labor Day TV deals from Best Buy on TCL sets include smart capabilities, which allow you to stream movies and TV shows from apps like Netflix, Disney Plus, Prime Video, and more. These smart TVs also feature a handy voice remote with the Google Assistant so you can use your voice to launch apps, search for titles, play music, and control compatible smart home devices.
